name: yes
title: yes manual page
description: The yes utility outputs expletive, or, by default, “y”, forever.

sections.title: NAME
codeBlocks:
yes – be repetitively affirmative
     yes [expletive]
     The yes utility outputs expletive, or, by default, “y”, forever.
     jot(1), seq(1)
     The yes command appeared in Version 7 AT&T UNIX.
